page.title: 10HOUSING IN UPWEY
page.content: OUT OF ALL THE ROADS IN THE UPWEY AREA DORCHESTER ROAD IS THE MAIN HOUSING ROAD WITH 80 HOUSES IN THE VICINITY OF OUR BLOCK.IN THIS ROAD MOST OF THE HOUSES ARE OLD AND INDIVIDUALLY BUILT. THE SECOND MAIN HOUSING ROAD IS CHURCH STREET 90% OF WHICH IS TAKEN UP BY DWELLINGS.MOST OF THE HOUSES IN THIS ROAD ARE DETACHED,SOME ARE OLD AND SOME ARE MODERN. ELWELL STREET HAS 44 HOUSES MOSTLY TERRACED PROPERTIES.CHAPEL LANE HAS 42 HOUSES OF A SIMILAR TYPE.STOTTINGWAY STREET HAS 90% COVERED BY HOUSING,ST. LAWRENCE ROAD AND ROMAN ROAD FROM 20 TO 35 HOUSES EACH.SHORTLANDS ROAD,FRIAR WADDON AND VICTORIA AVENUE ALL HAVE LESS THAN 20 HOUSES EACH. OVER ALL WE CAN SAY THAT UPWEY IS AN AVERAGE SIZED DORSET VILLAGE.
